text: This is an international list of osteopathic schools, universities and colleges that award a recognized osteopathic qualification. The degrees conferred vary widely, and include: Certificates, Diplomas (such as Diploma in Osteopathic Manual Practice - DOMP), Bachelors (such as bachelor of science in osteopathy), Masters (such as master of art in Osteopathic history), Doctor of Philosophy (PhD), Doctor of Osteopathy, Diploma in Osteopathy, and Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine. == Argentina == * Osteopathic Centre for Studies in Buenos Aires and Patagonia == Australia == * The Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology * Southern Cross University * Victoria University ==Austria== * Vienna School of Osteopathy * The International Academy of Osteopathy ==Belgium== * Belgian College of Osteopathy * Flanders International College of Osteopathy * International Academy of Osteopathy * Sutherland College of Osteopathic Medicine == Canada == * Ontario Academy of Progressive Osteopathy * Canadian Academy of Osteopathy * National Academy of Osteopathy * Canadian College of Osteopathy * Centre Ostéopathique du Québec * Collège d'Études Ostéopathiques * Établissementd’Enseignement Supérieur d’Ostéopathie du Canada * Southern Ontario College of Osteopathy * École Professionnelle des Ostéopathes du Québec, EPOQ * Ontario School of Osteopathy ==Chile== * OSTEOCHILE * Chilean School of Osteopathy == England (United Kingdom) == *Leeds Metropolitan University, M. Ost (Stopped Intakes 2014) * British College of Osteopathic Medicine * British School of Osteopathy * College of Osteopaths * European School of Osteopathy * London School of Osteopathy * Oxford Brookes University (Stopped Intakes 2014) * Swansea University ==Finland== * Osteopatiakoulu Atlas, Espoo, Finland Osteopatiakoulu Atlas * Helsinki Metropolia University of Applied Sciences == France == * Ecole Supérieure d'Ostéopathie (ESO) - Champs sur Marne - Île-de-France http://eso- suposteo.fr/ * Centre International d'Ostéopathie (CIDO) - Saint Etienne - Rhône-Alpes * Centre Europeen d'Enseignement Superieur de l'Osteopathie (CEESO) * Institut de Formation en Ostéopathie du Grand-Avignon * Institut Supérieur d'Ostéopathie * Institut Des Hautes Etudes Osteopathique De Nantes (IdHEO) * Still Academy * EFSO - Ecole Française Supérieure d'Ostéopathie - Paris == Germany == * Deutsches Osteopathie Kolleg (Rohdorf, Germany) * Still Academy * Osteopathy Academy of Munich * European College for Osteopathy * German School of Osteopathy * The International Academy of Osteopathy ==Ireland== * The Irish College of Osteopathic Medicine (ICOM) == Italy== * AbeOS, Abe Osteopathy Schoolhttp://www.abeos.it * Accademia di Osteopatia * Accademia Italiana Osteopati rche et la Diffusion Ostéopathiques * Centro Ricerche Olistiche per la Medicina Osteopatica e Naturale * European Institute for Osteopathic Medicine * International College of Osteopathic Medicine * Istituto Superiore di Osteopatia - Milano, Italy * Still Osteopathic Institute == New Zealand == * Unitec New Zealand - Master of Osteopathy programme ==Netherlands== * College Sutherland * The International Academy of Osteopathy == Norway == * University College of Health Sciences ==Poland== * Polish School of Osteopathy ==Ukraine== * East-European school of osteopathy == Russia == * Институт остеопатии СПбМАПО и СПбГУ * Русская Высшая Школа Остеопатической Медицины * Russian School of Osteopathic Medicine * Проект Остеопрактика, Москва (www.osteopract.ru) == Spain == * ECO Escuela del Concepto Osteopático * Madrid School of Osteopathy * European School of Osteopathy ==Sweden== * Scandinavian School of Osteopathy, delivers a Bachelor of Healthcare, Osteopathy, 240 ECTS == Switzerland == * University of Applied Sciences and Arts Western Switzerland, Faculty of Health, Division of Osteopathy delivers a Master of Science in Osteopathy within the School of Health Sciences Fribourg. * The International Academy of Osteopathy == United States of America == There are 34 osteopathic medical schools in the United States, which train "osteopathic physicians". Osteopathic physicians are fully qualified medical doctors holding the Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine (DO) degree, and they are licensed to perform surgery and prescribe medications in addition to osteopathic manual treatment. Osteopaths from any schools outside of the country are not permitted to practice in the U.S. as osteopaths. They however are permitted to practice as osteopathic manual practitioners. These manual osteopaths are permitted only to use manual techniques. They may not perform surgery nor prescribe medications. * A.T. Still University, with a Kirksville, Missouri campus and an Arizona campus * Alabama College of Osteopathic Medicine * Arkansas College of Osteopathic Medicine * Burrell College of Osteopathic Medicine * Campbell University School of Osteopathic Medicine * Des Moines University * Edward Via College of Osteopathic Medicine * Kansas City University of Medicine and Biosciences * Lake Erie College of Osteopathic Medicine, with campuses in Bradenton, FL, Erie, PA and Elmira, NY * Liberty University * Lincoln Memorial University * Marian University College of Osteopathic Medicine * Michigan State University College of Osteopathic Medicine * Midwestern University, with campuses in Chicago and Arizona * New York Institute of Technology College of Osteopathic Medicine * Nova Southeastern University College of Osteopathic Medicine * Ohio University Heritage College of Osteopathic Medicine * Oklahoma State University Center for Health Sciences * Pacific Northwest University of Health Sciences * Philadelphia College of Osteopathic Medicine, with campuses in Philadelphia and Georgia * Rocky Vista University * Touro College of Osteopathic Medicine – New York City * Touro University California * Touro University Nevada * Rowan University School of Osteopathic Medicine * University of New England College of Osteopathic Medicine * University of North Texas Health Science Center * University of Pikeville College of Osteopathic Medicine * West Virginia School of Osteopathic Medicine * Western University of Health Sciences, with a California campus and an Oregon campus * William Carey University == See also == * Osteopathy * Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine ==Notes and references== The International Academy of Osteopathy ==External links== * Osteopathic International Alliance Category:Lists of universities and colleges Category:Osteopathic manipulative medicine
title: List of osteopathic colleges
